    • getBlockchainData

      public String[] getBlockchainData()
      Method to get the current state of the blockchain as an array of Strings. Each block is represented as a string in the format: "Block Index: [index], Data: [data], Hash: [hash], Previous Hash: [prevHash]"
      Returns:
      A string array of the blockchain data.

      Returns:
      The proof as a list of byte arrays.

    • verifyMerkleProof

      public boolean verifyMerkleProof(String data, List<byte[]> proof)
      Method to verify the proof for a specific data element.
      Parameters:
      data - The data to verify.
      proof - The proof to verify against.
      Returns:
      True if the proof is valid, false otherwise.
